title: Ihram
description: The pilgrim enters into the state of Ihram by performing the intention and wearing the prescribed garments.

title: Tawaf
description: Perform Tawaf around the Kaaba seven times, beginning and ending at the Black Stone.

title: Sa'i
description: Perform Sa'i by walking seven times between the hills of Safa and Marwa.

title: Mina
description: Head to Mina and stay overnight.

title: Arafat
description: Head to Arafat and stand in vigil, engaging in prayer and reflection.

title: Muzdalifah
description: After sunset, head to Muzdalifah and spend the night there.

title: Ramy
description: Stone the three pillars at Mina (Jamarat) representing Satan.

title: Animal Sacrifice
description: Perform the ritual sacrifice of an animal in commemoration of Prophet Ibrahim's willingness to sacrifice his son.

title: Halq or Taqsir
description: Shave the head (Halq) or trim the hair (Taqsir) to symbolize the renewal of the pilgrim's life.

title: Tawaf al-Ifadah
description: Perform Tawaf al-Ifadah, a shorter Tawaf, to signify the completion of Hajj rituals.

title: Sa'i of Hajj
description: Perform Sa'i of Hajj by walking seven times between Safa and Marwa.

title: Farewell Tawaf
description: Perform a final Tawaf around the Kaaba as a farewell.
